item.description:
Let's go celebrate Cavey's 75th anniversary with the restaurant's special menu, brought back from 1933. Enjoy a prix fixe three-course menu in the Italian restaurant for $19.33 each Wednesday this year, consisting of choice of soup or salad, one of three entr√©es and dessert. Available in the Italian Restaurant & Piano Bar only. Please check out their menu: http://www.caveysrest...

Plenty of parking in the rear - be sure to go in the entrance on LEFT of building, or on the street.

I have wanted to go back here for a while, this place has been an institution in my hometown since before I was born.

Some Ethnic Dining "Rules":

1) If you RSVP "YES" you are expected to SHOW UP!!! Be polite and make sure you change your RSVP by 1:00pm the day before if need be. If you have to cancel at the last minute call the restaurant to let them know.

2) Please bring cash, it is so much quicker and easier. Remember, no one leaves until the bill is paid - this is respect for the event's host and the other diners.

3) I will collect $1.00 from each participant for Meetup fees.

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Cavey's 06/30/10 7:00pm
